gov.nasa.jpf.util.script

Class StringExpander

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.util.script.StringExpander

  • public class StringExpander
extends Object
    utility class to expand regular expression like strings. We support alternatives "<..|..>" and character categories "[.. X-Z ..]". Alternatives can be nested, char categories can include '-' ranges e.g. "az" => aBz, aX0Yz, aX1Yz <2do> this is awfully connected to ESParser - we should really make it more generic (this is the reason why it was moved from the general gov.nasa.jpf.util to this package)
